title: Watch Out, Biden Is Coming to a Neighborhood Near You! | 7/7/21 | The Glenn Beck Program
description:
Stu and Pat discuss how Biden's decline is so bad, even news outlets around the world are mentioning it. Jeffy joins to discuss the Biden administration's intention to go door-to-door to convince people to get vaccinated and Andrew Cuomo’s daughter coming out as a "demisexual." Defense company Raytheon is more focused on woke staff training than the country's defense. Over $150,000 worth of merchandise was stolen from Neiman Marcus, as shoplifting is on the rise all over the country. Stu and Pat talk about how soldiers in Afghanistan are leaving in the middle of the night. Pat and Stu explain how fireworks are now racist and denying evolution is now white supremacy.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
